metadata.description: Personal skills and plugins for Claude Code

plugins.name: example-skill

plugins.description: Git worktree management with cc-sessions integration for parallel task orchestration

plugins.name: plane

plugins.description: Parallel agent coordination system with status reporting and monitoring TUI

plugins.name: agent-evals
plugins.description: Local-first testing framework for validating Claude Code subagent behavior using Bun test runner
